OOC: Invasion was cool, Jer and I just watched it on ppv. =)

--- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---

Lynxiz enters the Chivitron base, and heads for the CR chambers. 
Trinity was looking pale, but would likely survive the ordeal. As she 
enters the CR room, she spots Burning Hammer on the ground 
unconcious, "Burning Hammer? Uhh, hello?" She puts Trinity into 
an empty (obviously =P) CR chamber, and starts the process 
knowing that the small bot will be done soon. Then she turns to 
BH, "Hmmm, you don't look so good..." She kneels beside him, 
and examines him, looking for a reason for his unconcious state.

Meanwhile, outside the Chivitron base, Lokk is still hiding behind 
the hill. He spots Windlord fighting close combat with Vampiza, 
and grumbles, not wanting to shoot and damage his fellow 
Chivitron. He picks out Apewing, and his twin chainguns unload 
half a clip each, hoping to surprise the bot.

Axis peeks his head over the pod, and spots Speed Viper. He fires 
a laser blast, then arcs a missile at the bot. Then he crouches 
back behind the pod.
